title: Digital nomads / itinerant hackers meet-up
description:
A meet-up for digital nomads / itinerant hackers.
Are you a digital nomad or an itinerant hacker? Come and meet others who are as well!Do you have questions about life as a digital nomad or an itinerant hacker? Come and ask.This space is open for anyone who wants to make friends, talk travel, swap packing tips, or ask about the 200, 404 and 500  of working remote from around the world.
